channel.title: Level 19 on Derme's Coffee
channel.description: Recent content in Level 19 on Derme's Coffee

item.title: Level 19 - Homeworld Remastered
item.description: I have not been excited for a video game release for quite some time, but when this was announced I was excited. When I played the original Homeworld in 1999 I loved it, even though I could never get past the 6thmission at the time, it’s a game that’s stuck with me since. This game with the new engine is simply stunning. The visuals are incredible, the cut scenes are re-mastered and the sound quality is excellent.

item.title: Level 19 - Innoquous 4
item.description: NAL the creator of Mmm and MADDENING for iPhone recently released his newest title Innoqous 4 on PC. It’s his first title in 3D and makes Innoquous 4 the best in the gravity-flipping series. The first thing you’ll probably notice is that it is his best looking game yet. Previous NAL games have focused on game play rather than graphics in the past. It also has a very nice soundtrack that blends nicely into the game play.
